title: Fruitcake Fraud
description:
To celebrate the holidays, Tig and Cheryl bite into "Fruitcake Fraud," which has both twists-and-turns AND a festive theme to its true crime story! We'll be back in 2022 with brand new episodes of True Story! *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
